source_item.name: Lesser Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Death Coil and Epidemic by 4.5%, stacking up to 10 times. Death Coil and Epidemic have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: Casting Dark Transformation grants up to 10 stacks of Winning Streak! and while Dark Transformation is active, the effectiveness of Winning Streak! is increased by 100% and it no longer has a chance to reset.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,210 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,957 to 9,725 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 295 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

enchantments.display_string: Enchanted: Rune of the Fallen Crusader

name: Best-in-Slots

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant you 4,093 to 5,003 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec.
Use: Cheat to immediately gain 5,003 of your highest secondary stat for 15 sec. While out of combat, reconfigure for spell casting instead. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: The wise goblin makes their own luck.

spells.description: Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
